main event: A commercial pilot observed 7 to 10 luminous objects following landing aircraft at McClellan AFB on April 30, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be of a gray-white color and appeared round to oblong in shape., The sighting lasted between 3 to 5 seconds., The objects were brighter than stars and moved in a straight line at approximately 500 mph., There were other sightings reported on April 2 and April 6 in the same location with varying descriptions., The sightings were later classified and documented in the Project Blue Book records.
